评论详情: Beautiful ring but turned my finger green.
The Stone looks just like a clear piece of glass. I have several pieces of moonstone in this is the only one it’s like that.

This ring is Soo pretty! It does fit a bit big and doesn’t have an exact ring size. I got 8mm and it fit perfect for a 7 - 7.5. It looks more blue than a regular moonstone looks but it’s very pretty. Totally recommend!
